entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
